import * as React from 'react'; import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles'; import {Box,Button, Paper, Grid, Rating, Typography} from '@mui/material'; const Item = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({ backgroundColor: theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#1A2027' : '#fff', ...theme.typography.body2, padding: theme.spacing(1), textAlign: 'center', color: theme.palette.text.secondary, })); function CartItem() { return ( theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#1A2027' : '#fff', }} > ankle drape slacks Ot1210 ブラック / M ¥6,100 {"4"} ); } export default function Cart({cart}) { if(cart.id===undefined)return "loading" return ( theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#1A2027' : '#fff', }} > ショッピングカート
ID: {cart.id} {cart.line_items.map((elem) => ( ))} 合計: {cart.subtotal} ショッピングガイド ); }
